metadataAttributes.Title: Microsoft Azure Management Tools and Security Solutions
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Microsoft Azure offers a wide range of services to deploy your applications. To keep control of your environment and to make deployments easier, it also offers a wide array of management tools and services. In this course, you will be introduced to these tools and services and you will be asked to help choose the best one for a given business scenario.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Cloud Computing Security,Artificial Intelligence (AI),Microsoft Azure,Internet Of Things (IOT),
